                                      java.lang.String continentName)
        Removes continent from the map.
        Parameters:
        map - Current map object.
        continentName - Name of the continent.
        Returns:
        true if continent got removed successfully, otherwise false

                                   java.lang.String ctrlValue,
                                   java.lang.String color)

        name - Name of the continent.
        ctrlValue - Control value of the continent.
        color - Color of the continent.
        Returns:
        true if continent gets added to map, false otherwise.

      • containsContinentName

                                            java.lang.String name)
        This method checks whether the continent name is present or not.
        Parameters:
        listContinents - list of all continents
        name - name of the continents to be updated
        Returns:
        true if list does not contain other continents with same name

      • updateContinent

        public static Continent updateContinent(Continent continent,
                                        Hmap map,
                                        java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String ctrlValue)
                                 throws InvalidMap
        This method updates the continent details if the user selects the continent.
        Parameters:
        continent - The continent whose details must be updated.
        map - map object Hmap
        name - name of the continent to be updated
        ctrlValue - The control value of the continent.
        Returns:
        The current continent.
        Throws:
        InvalidMap - InvalidMapException if any error occurs

        This checks whether the Country name is there or not.
        Parameters:

        name - name of the Country to be checked
        Returns:
        true if list does not contain other Country with same name

        Removes country from the map.

        name - Name of the Country.
        Returns:

      • addCountry

        public static boolean addCountry(Hmap map,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String continentName)
        Adds country to the map and the continent with its respective details.
        Parameters:
        map - Current map object.
        name - Name of the Country.
        continentName - Continent to which the country belongs to.
        Returns:
        true if Country gets added to map, false otherwise.

      • updateCountry

        public static Country updateCountry(Country country,
                                    Hmap map,
                                    java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String xCo,
                                    java.lang.String yCo,
                                    Country adjCoun)
                             throws InvalidMap
        This method updates the continent details when the user selects the country.
        Parameters:
        country - The country whose values must be updated.
        map - Map Object Hmap
        name - name for the Country to be updated - new name for the Country
        xCo - X-Co-ordinate of the Country.
        yCo - Y-Co-ordinate of the Country.
        adjCoun - The adjacent Countries list.
        Returns:
        The object to the newly updated Country.
        Throws:
        InvalidMap - if any error occurs

      • removeNeighborCountry

        public static boolean removeNeighborCountry(Hmap map,
                                            java.lang.String countryName,
                                            java.lang.String nbrCountryName)
        This method removes the country to the corresponding continent.
        Parameters:
        map - Current map object.
        countryName - Name of the Country.
        nbrCountryName - Name of the neighbor Country.
        Returns:
        true if neighbor Country gets removed from map, false otherwise.

      • addNeighborCountry

        public static boolean addNeighborCountry(Hmap map,
                                         java.lang.String countryName,
                                         java.lang.String nbrCountryName)
        This method adds the country to the corresponding continent.
        Parameters:
        map - Current map object.
        countryName - Name of the Country.
        nbrCountryName - Name of the neighbor Country.
        Returns:
        true if neighbor Country gets added to map, false otherwise.

                                              Country country)
        This method adds the country to the corresponding continent.
        Parameters:
        continent - continent object which will be assigned Countries
        country - The country which is added to the continent.
        Returns:
        the Object to the newly updated continent.
